snippet: The resentments between China and Japan predate World War II by centuries.
abstract: Op-Ed article by international history Prof Odd Arne Westad examines way in which relationship between China and Japan is haunted by long shadow of history between two countries; examines history of tension between two countries, which prevents them from benefiting from their mutual interests.
lead_paragraph: The resentments between China and Japan predate World War II by centuries.

headline.seo: Why China and Japan Can’t Get Along
headline.main: In Asia, Ill Will Runs Deep
headline.print_headline: In Asia, Ill Will Runs Deep
